Public MustInherit Class TextLine Implements IDisposable
public ref class TextLine abstract : IDisposable

summary.span: 为文本行提供一个支持格式设置服务的抽象类。

span.span: Provides an abstract class for supporting formatting services to a line of text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回值是`null`行时在段落的结尾结束。The return value is `null` when the line ends at the end of the paragraph. 文本格式化程序客户端可能的返回值传递回作为参数传递给方法，它允许在同一段中的下一步行格式设置时要使用的值。The text formatter client may pass the return value back as a parameter to the method, which allows the value to be used when formatting the next line within the same paragraph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置了属性值时，才属性设置为，并有一个单词的宽度超过格式设置的段落宽度。The property value is set only when the property of is set to , and a single word is wider than the formatting paragraph width. 在这种情况下，截断单词遵守指定的所需的行为的中间行设置。In such situation, truncates the line in the middle of the word to honor the desired behavior specified by setting.
